Data Files

The following datasets are included in the repository:

Data Geographic Level Time Period Harmonization File Name Download Link
Local Elections Municipality 1990–2021 No municipal_unharm CSV RDS
Local Elections Municipality 1990–2021 Yes municipal_harm CSV RDS
State Elections Municipality 2006–2019 No state_unharm CSV RDS
State Elections Municipality 2006–2019 Yes state_harm CSV RDS
Federal Elections Municipality 1980–2025 No federal_muni_raw CSV RDS
Federal Elections Municipality 1980–2025 No federal_muni_unharm CSV RDS
Federal Elections Municipality 1990–2025 Yes (2021) federal_muni_harm_21 CSV RDS
Federal Elections Municipality 1990–2025 Yes (2025) federal_muni_harm_25 CSV RDS
Federal Elections County 1953–2025 No federal_cty_unharm CSV RDS
Federal Elections County 1990–2025 Yes (2021) federal_cty_harm_21 CSV RDS
Federal Elections County 1990–2025 Yes (2025) federal_cty_harm_25 CSV RDS
Crosswalks Municipality/County 1990–2025 — ags_crosswalks / cty_crosswalks CSV RDS
Shapefiles Municipality/County 2000, 2021, 2025 — VG250_GEM / VG250_KRS 2000 2021 2025
Crosswalk Covariates Municipality/County 1990–2025 Yes ags_area_pop_emp / cty_area_pop_emp CSV RDS

R Package Usage

The easiest way to access the data is via our companion R package:

# Install the package from GitHub
# if (!requireNamespace("devtools", quietly = TRUE)) install.packages("devtools")
# devtools::install_github("hhilbig/gerda")

library(gerda)
library(dplyr)

# Load the harmonized federal election data (municipality level)
# Choose between 2021 or 2025 harmonized versions
data_fed_harm_21 <- load_gerda_web("federal_muni_harm_21", verbose = TRUE, file_format = "rds")
data_fed_harm_25 <- load_gerda_web("federal_muni_harm_25", verbose = TRUE, file_format = "rds")

# View the structure
glimpse(data_fed_harm_21)
glimpse(data_fed_harm_25)

Data Sources

Federal Elections

Bundeswahlleiterin. https://www.bundeswahlleiterin.de/bundeswahlleiter.html

State Elections

Statistische Ämter des Bundes und der Länder. Landtagswahlen. https://www.regionalstatistik.de/genesis/online/ (Regional data bank of the German Federal Statistical Office). Retrieved and imported using the wiesbaden R package and the SOAP XML web service of DESTATIS.

Municipal Elections

Data obtained from various state statistical offices through their websites or via email requests. For detailed sources by state, please refer to our GitHub repository.

Crosswalks

Bundesinstitut für Bau-, Stadt- und Raumforschung. Umsteigeschlüssel für konsistente zeitreihen. https://www.bbsr.bund.de/BBSR/DE/forschung/raumbeobachtung/umstiegsschluessel/umsteigeschluessel.html (2024).

Shapefiles

Federal Agency for Cartography and Geodesy (BKG). Vg250: Administrative boundaries of germany. http://www.bkg.bund.de (2021). Open Data Lizenz Deutschland – Namensnennung – Version 2.0. Source reference: © GeoBasis-DE / BKG (year of last data download).

German Election Database | GERDA

  • Hanno Hilbig, Vincent Heddesheimer, Florian Sichart, Andreas Wiedemann
  • hhilbig@ucdavis.edu

    Comprehensive dataset of local, state, and federal election results in Germany, facilitating research on electoral behavior, representation, and political responsiveness. Umfassende Datenbank von: Bundestagswahlergebnissen, Landeswahlergebnissen und Kommunalwahlergebnissen in Deutschland, die die Forschung zu Wahlverhalten, politischer Repräsentation und politischer Reaktionsfähigkeit ermöglicht.
